t: For the director of music. A psalm of David.
How*pn long, Lord?*s Will you forget me forever? How*ld long will you hide your face from me?
How*ln long must I wrestle with my thoughts and*ld day after day have sorrow in my heart? How*ld long will my enemy triumph over me?
Look*pn on me and answer, Lord*s my God. Give*ld light to my eyes, or I will sleep in death,
and*ln my enemy will say, “I have overcome him,” and*ld my foes will rejoice when I fall.
But*pn I trust in your unfailing love; my*ld heart rejoices in your salvation.
I*ln will sing the Lord’s*s praise, for*ld he has been good to me.
